Hey there, I am a biologist diving into bioinformatics. My interests circle around bacteria-phage interactions, its evolution and ecology. Currently working on the emergence of phenotypical variants in *B. tequilensis* EA-CB0015. I'm also working on a bioinformatics [book](https://camilogarciabotero.github.io/biocomp-book/).
